mapper.sql: SELECT comment_id, post_id, parent_id, content, user_id, status, create_time, update_time FROM forum_comment
mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id AS commentId, c.post_id AS postId, c.parent_id AS parentId, c.user_id AS userId, u.user_name AS userName, c.content, c.status, c.create_time AS createTime, c.update_time AS updateTime FROM forum_comment c LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.status = '0' AND c.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY c.create_time DESC
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM forum_comment WHERE post_id = #{postId} AND status = '0'
